title: 263. Q&AF: Handling Bad Leadership, Best Advice Given & Being On Time
itunes:title: 263. Q&AF: Handling Bad Leadership, Best Advice Given & Being On Time
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on how to handle bad leadership within an organization, what is the best piece of advice he was given early on in his life, and why being on time is non-negotiable when working towards your goals.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on how to handle bad leadership within an organization, what is the best piece of advice he was given early on in his life, and why being on time is non-negotiable when working towards your goals.
